bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss

Territory, Plaintiff vs. Ray Raymond, Defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington in and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting:

In the name of the United States, you are hereby commanded to summon B C VanHouten and bring with him a check in words following "May 24/86 "N Bennett: Pay J.W. Finch the sum of three dollars & sixty-two cents ($3.62) for work in May, Geo Noble"

to be and appear before the District Court, at the Court House in Spokane Falls, in said County, on the 30th day of May A.D. 1887, at 11 o'clock A.M. to here give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Defendant there to remain until discharged.
WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the seal thereof affixed this 30th day of May A.D. 1887
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy.

figure.p: District Court Washington Territory Spokane County Fourth Jud District

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane} ss
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to him in said County, on this 30 day of May A.D. 1887.
James Glispin, Sheriff
By A.J. Duncan, Deputy.
Case No. 1886
SUBPOENA
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
Territory Plaintiff
vs.
Ray Raymond Defendant
Returned and filed this 30th day of May A.D. 1887 D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy
SHERIFF'S FEES. Serving 1 names at .40 .40 Mileage 2 miles at .10 .20 Total - - - - $.60
